settings.about_description:
Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium

Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium,

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain. These cases are perfectly simple and easy to distinguish. In a free hour, when our power of choice is untrammelled and when nothing prevents our being able to do what we like best, every pleasure is to be welcomed and every pain avoided. But in certain circumstances and owing to the claims of duty or the obligations of business it will frequently occur that pleasures have to be repudiated and annoyances accepted. The wise man therefore always holds in these matters to this principle of selection: he rejects pleasures to secure other greater pleasures, or else he endures pains to avoid worse pains.

settings.testi_desc: you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings.

settings.subtitle: Luxe Barbeque Company is a locally owned and operated business. We have the largest selection in Manitoba, we service what we sell, have educated & knowledgeable staff who like to help and NOBODY will beat our prices.
settings.trans_bottom_title: Luxe Barbeque Company is a locally owned and operated business. We have the largest selection in Manitoba, we service what we sell, have educated & knowledgeable staff who like to help and NOBODY will beat our prices.

settings.slide_subtitle: A perfect BBQ time is waiting for you.

settings.covidresponse_text: Click Here for our COVID-19 Response

settings.desc: Driven by flavor, innovation and a culture unlike anything else in the bbq community.  Pellet grills and smokers are your easiest way to achieve the wood fired flavor that everyone craves.  With a set it and forget it system, these grills are easy to use and can turn the rookie griller into someone the neighbours envy.  Available in an arrange of brands, sizes and price ranges, we can certainly help you find the Pellet grill that is a perfect fit for you, your family and your lifestyle.

settings.covidresponse_text: Click Here for our COVID-19 Respons    >>

settings.desc: The tried and true, the old reliable, the grill or smoker everyone trusts to prepare a worry free meal for family, friends and who ever happens to wander into the backyard when the smell of grilled steak or veggies lingers in the air.  We have a huge selection of brands, that not only look great, but have features you didn’t even know you needed.  We select the grills and smokers specifically for our stores to ensure that we have a grill or smoker for everyone.

Authenticity is the best way to describe an offset smoker.  Its as hands on as it gets in the world of smoking.  Tending the fire, adjusting the temperature, if you want southern que the offset is for you.  Built to last and as basic as it comes these will hold up for years and you will be able to not only make food that is remembered, but the memories built around the cooker will be ones you will always look back on and smile….and maybe drool a bit too!

The grill everyone remembers as a kid.  The smell in the air, the char on the food and the taste of that charcoal flavor that everyone craves.  Charcoal grills are as versatile as they come and with a selection as large as we have you are sure to find the grill of your dreams…. Or childhood memories.

Designing the perfect backyard oasis….?  Let us help!  We have a selection of styles, sizes and price ranges that will fit with any outdoor kitchen your planning.  Grills, smokers, pizza ovens, components and full islands, let us help you never want to leave the yard again.

Built in, portable, and free standing, we have all the wood fired, and gas pizza ovens you could dream of.  Do you want to be the talk of the town, the house hold everyone wants to visit?  Its simple, make some pizza, who doesn’t love it?  With all sizes, fuel types and accessories available, you struggle to order take out again.
